title.narrative: Africa Maternal and Child Health Phase II

description.narrative: The Africa Maternal and Child Health Phase II initiative provides support for the program design and development support for the Africa maternal child health program, specifically: provision of technical appraisal of the Government of Ethiopia's (GoE) Millennium Development Goal Performance Fund (MDGPF), refinement of donor financing and coordination instruments and arrangements; collaboration and advisory support on development design with Hamlin Fistula International and the African Medical and Research Foundation; design advice on activities proposed in Tanzania; fiduciary risk assessments on health sector SWAPs in Ethiopia; engagement with Government of South Sudan and donor agencies in Sudan towards mobilisation of funding support for maternal and child health; and advisory support for development of AMCHI monitoring and evaluation. The total value of this initiative is $1.7 million over 5 years, starting 2010-11.
